title: How many "Likes"üëç & Followers we get for deeds we do for Allah #Assim #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: I mean uh make sure you guys like And subscribe sh how many likes do we want to get on this video come in how many likes do we want to get on this video who cares sign of your sincerity yes is that you don't care about people liking or criticizing you do it for the sake of Allah and you don't check how many followers do I have how many likes do I have Whoever likes it alhamdulillah I've done it for the sake of Allah if Allah approves of it and if Allah reward you for it who cares about who likes and who dislikes yes
